name: infraredLevel_setValue
description: This function is used to adjust the infrared sensor level of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the infrared sensor level.

parameters.name: infraredLevel
parameters.description: The new infrared sensor level to be set.
